fixed_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Magarudyne

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Attack by 7.9% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Mataru III

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 14.5%. Increase Wind damage taken by foes with debuffs by 22%. If Windswept, increase effect by 25% more.
passive_skill.name: Storm of Shadows

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 14.5%. Increase Wind damage taken by foes with debuffs by 25%. If Windswept, increase effect by 25% more.
passive_skill.name: Storm of Shadows I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 14.5%. Increase Wind damage taken by foes with debuffs by 28%. If Windswept, increase effect by 25% more.
passive_skill.name: Storm of Shadows II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
